greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of divisors d of n of the form d == 7 (mod 8).
comment: a(A188226(n))=n and a(m)<>n for m<A188226(n), n>=0; a(A141164(n))=1. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Mar 26 2011
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
M. D. Hirschhorn, The number of representations of a number by various forms, Discrete Mathematics 298 (2005), 205-211.
formula: G.f.: Sum_{k>=1} x^(7*k)/(1 - x^(8*k)). - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Sep 11 2019
maple: sigmamr := proc(n,m,r) local a,d ; a := 0 ; for d in numtheory[divisors](n) do if modp(d,m) = r then a := a+1 ; end if; end do: a; end proc:
program: a188172 n = length $ filter ((== 0) . mod n) [7,15..n]
results.author: _R. J. Mathar_, Mar 23 2011
